All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Main
Allows the Time, Menus, storeClass, Player, randomEvents, and Oxen classes to interact
Map
Map from Independence, MO to Ash Hollow, NE Depth, Length, Distance in MILES All distances are relative to Independence, MO Temperature in FAHRENHEIT Time is 24-Hour Clock
Menus
Provides console I/O for the text-based game UI Implemented using the Scanner class
Oxen
This class is very similar to Player, just less featured, much like the original game.
Player
 
randomEvents
 
storeClass
 
Time
Subclass of both Map and Weather Responsible for day tracking, implementing map/weather generation, and location visits
wagonClass
 
Weather
Provides weather generation and tracking functionality
